scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install --include=dev && cd ../client && npm install --include=dev
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.migrate:prod: cd server && npx prisma@5.22.0 db push --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
